room_title: Escape room "The Mustache Thief" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Our family had so much fun doing this! We will absolutely be back! Staff is great! Glad we found this little gem!

room_title: Escape room "The Mustache Thief" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: We had a blast, escaped, barely and it was worth every second.

room_title: Escape room "The Mustache Thief" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Excellent change of pace from the monotony of boring group activities. I personally panicked while my group kept it together, but we all had a blast and spent the following three hours talking about how we could've handled the challenges better. Too much fun, just the right level of difficulty without sitting around painfully on one task at a time. We all can't wait til next time.

room_title: Escape room "The Mustache Thief" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: We had a great time doing this. Would recommend to any family. The only thing we were bummed about is one of the locks was not locked so we skipped one door. They did apologize but thought they could give us a coupon for the next time.

room_title: Escape room "The Mustache Thief" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: We went back for a second time for our son's birthday. We had a BLAST with his buddies! They escaped the Mustache Thief room with 14 seconds left. Truly an excellent venue for any sort of celebration --- especially birthdays!! Love it!

room_title: Escape room "The Mustache Thief" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Had an awesome time! Did this with my husband on a date night, and will definitely go back with friends next time. The hour goes by fast!
